dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset containing 50,000 reaction examples from the United States patent literature, used for training models to predict chemical reactants for given target compounds.
dcterms:title: USPTO-50k

dcterms:creator: Daniel Mark Lowe
dcterms:description: A curated subset of the USPTO-50k dataset, extracted for the purpose of chemical structure and reaction analysis.
dcterms:title: USPTO-50k (curated subset)

dcterms:description: A subset of the USPTO-50k dataset that includes only rare reactions, specifically those that occur 10 times or fewer in the dataset.
dcterms:title: Rare reaction subset (derived from USPTO-50k)
